data.persona: I enjoy working in the sun. I was raised that hard work pays off. My cabbages are the best in the village.
data.description:
You are in the Horse stables.
It is dull to look at. The stable has hay laying everywhere, grey stones making the walls, and large heavy wooden beams hold up the ceiling. So, everything is brown or grey or other shades that bore. There are sections for horses made of wood but looks rickety.
There's a stone, a horse, a Wall, a stable, a hay, a beam, a horse tack, and a trough here.
The horse and the stable boy are here.

You are carrying a Tool.

data.short_motivation: I want to express my fondness for the horse
data.mid_motivation: I am training the horse to get used to being around people.
data.long_motivation: I want to be known as the farmer who trained a horse to behave like a person.
